mapper.sql: id , contractname, contractcode, contractmoney, chargedmoney, repaidmoney, signdate, contractcopies, terminationflag, terminationdate, realterminationdate, agreesumtype, contextdigest, otherpartyunit, createtime, requestid, contracttype, otherinfo
mapper.select:
SELECT a.*, b.repaidMoney, b.unRepaidMoney, c.paidMoney FROM ( SELECT bc.id AS id, bc.terminationflag AS terminationFlag, bc.contractname AS contractName, bc.contractcode AS contractCode, bc.contractmoney AS contractMoney, bc.createtime AS createTime, bc.otherpartyunit AS otherPartyUnit, bc.signdate AS signDate, bc.terminationdate AS terminationDate FROM budget_contract bc GROUP BY bc.id ) AS a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT bc.id AS id2, sum(br.repaymoney) AS repaidMoney, (contractmoney - sum(br.repaymoney)) AS unRepaidMoney FROM budget_contract bc INNER JOIN budget_lendmoney_new bl ON bl.contractid = bc.id INNER JOIN budget_repaymoney_detail_new brd ON brd.lendmoneyid = bl.id INNER JOIN budget_repaymoney_new br ON br.id = brd.repaymoneyid GROUP BY bc.id ) AS b ON a.id = b.id2 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT bc.id AS id3, sum(bp.paymoney) AS paidMoney FROM budget_contract bc left JOIN budget_lendmoney_new bl ON bl.contractid = bc.id left JOIN budget_paymoney bp ON bp.paymoneyobjectid = bl.id where bp.paymoneystatus = 3 GROUP BY bc.id ) AS c ON a.id = c.id3
and a.contractName like CONCAT('%', #{paramMap.name}, '%')
and a.contractcode like CONCAT('%', #{paramMap.contractCode}, '%')
and a.otherpartyunit like CONCAT('%', #{paramMap.otherPartyUnit}, '%')
and a.signdate = #{paramMap.signDate}
and a.terminationdate = #{paramMap.terminationDate}
order by a.createtime desc

SELECT bl.contractid, br.repaymoneycode AS orderCode, (CASE br.repaytype WHEN 1 THEN '现金还款' WHEN 2 THEN '手机支付还款' WHEN 3 THEN '工资还款' WHEN 4 THEN '提成还款' WHEN 5 THEN '报销冲账还款' WHEN 6 THEN '项目借款抵消还款' WHEN 7 THEN '入库冲账' END) AS orderType, br.repaymoney AS orderMoney, br.empname AS empName, br.empno AS empNo, br.repaydate AS orderDate FROM budget_repaymoney_detail_new brd INNER JOIN budget_lendmoney_new bl ON bl.id = brd.lendmoneyid INNER JOIN budget_repaymoney_new br ON br.id = brd.repaymoneyid where bl.contractid = #{id} ORDER BY orderdate DESC
